name: Robert Chadwick
cooked: What are the actual steps? Should I put copyright messages on my PCB artwork/source code? Do I need to meet specific requirements to put the ‘Open Hardware’ symbol on my PCB? Other than making a mental note to myself and releasing everything, what else should I do?
raw: What are the actual steps? Should I put copyright messages on my PCB artwork/source code? Do I need to meet specific requirements to put the 'Open Hardware' symbol on my PCB? Other than making a mental note to myself and releasing everything, what else should I do?
